text: Klaus Ambrosch (born 23 May 1973 in Knittelfeld) is an Austrian decathlete. His personal best result was 8122 points, achieved in July 2001 at the Hypo- Meeting in Götzis. His life partner is the German long jumper Bianca Kappler.EAA profile for Bianca Kappler ==Achievements== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:95%;" width="75%" !Year !Tournament !Venue !Result !Event |- |1996 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |24th |Decathlon |- |1997 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |19th |Decathlon |- |1999 |Hypo- Meeting |Götzis, Austria |DNF |Decathlon |- |rowspan=2|2000 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |11th |Decathlon |- |Olympic Games |Sydney, Australia |18th |Decathlon |- |rowspan=3|2001 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |6th |Decathlon |- |World Championships |Edmonton, Canada |DNF |Decathlon |- |Universiade |Beijing, China |7th |Decathlon |- |rowspan=3|2002 |European Indoor Championships |Vienna, Austria |12th |Heptathlon |- |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |12th |Decathlon |- |European Championships |Munich, Germany |12th |Decathlon |- |2003 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |5th |Decathlon |} ==References== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:People from Knittelfeld District Category:Austrian decathletes Category:Austrian male athletes Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Austria Category:Sportspeople from Styria
